parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the CVT transmission can cause the vehicle to hesitate or jerk when accelerating, leading to a loss of power and potentially causing accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The transmission shudders
lacks take-off power
hesitates to shift gears
makes loud noises
and has a delayed or sudden loss of acceleration power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The airbag light staying on constantly can be a safety hazard, as it may indicate a malfunction in the airbag system, which can lead to injuries or fatalities in the event of an accident.
symptoms: The airbag light stays on constantly
with no codes or diagnoses available.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of airbags to deploy in the event of a crash can lead to serious injuries or fatalities, compromising the safety of the vehicle's occupants.
symptoms: Airbags fail to deploy in a crash
despite meeting the deployment threshold; occupants suffer injuries or fatalities as a result.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The Takata airbag recall has led to injuries and fatalities due to the faulty airbag inflators, which can rupture and cause harm to occupants.
symptoms: Airbag warning lights illuminate on the dashboard; airbags deploy with excessive force
causing injuries; occupants suffer injuries or fatalities as a result.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unavailability of recall parts or delayed repairs can leave vehicles on the road with faulty airbag systems, posing a risk to occupants.
symptoms: Recall notices are received
but parts are unavailable or repairs are delayed; owners are left with vehicles that may have faulty airbag systems.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the airbag system can lead to accidents or injuries, as the airbag may not deploy properly in the event of a crash.
symptoms: The airbag warning light illuminates continuously
the airbag system fails to deploy
or the system malfunctions.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the IMA system can cause the vehicle to lose power, making it difficult to accelerate, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The IMA system stops working
the vehicle loses power
the battery light comes on
the vehicle shutters or hesitates during acceleration
the vehicle has a slow or delayed acceleration.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The premature failure of the hybrid battery can cause the vehicle to lose power, making it difficult to accelerate, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The hybrid battery wears out prematurely
the vehicle loses power
the battery light comes on
the vehicle has a slow or delayed acceleration.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch and transmission system can cause the vehicle to lose power, making it difficult to accelerate, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle shutters or hesitates during acceleration
the vehicle has a slow or delayed acceleration
the clutch pedal feels soft or spongy.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ignition lock system can cause the vehicle to turn off while in motion, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle can be turned off and the key can be removed from the ignition while the car is in drive.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ECM software can cause the vehicle to lose power, making it difficult to accelerate, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle loses power
the check engine light comes on
the vehicle has a slow or delayed acceleration.
